document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Without </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">smile </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Without </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">throe </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">Summer's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">soft </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">assemblies </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">go </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">entrancing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">end </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Unknown </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">times </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">met </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Estranged, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">however </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">intimate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">What </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">dissembling </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Friend </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Without a smile - without a throe
